sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Container, Nav } from "./styled-components"; // fusioncharts import FusionCharts from "fusioncharts"; import Charts from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts"; import Maps from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.maps"; import USARegion from "fusionmaps/maps/es/fusioncharts.usaregion"; import ReactFC from "react-fusioncharts"; import "./charts-theme"; import config from "./config"; import Dropdown from "react-dropdown"; import formatNum from "./format-number"; // Components import Counter from "./Counter"; import UserImg from "../assets/images/user-img-placeholder.jpeg"; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, Charts, Maps, USARegion); class App extends Component { render() { return ( {/* content area start */} {/* row 1 */} small small $ {/* row 2 */} big small $ {/* footer */} small footer ); } } export default App;
